She works selling clothes and shoes. By means of this work, she has been able to generate a little more income with which she helps her husband. She is happy that, by working, she can help her family and offer them a better quality of life. 
Her greatest dream is that her children will go to the university and become good professionals. One day, she wants to have a store where she can sell her products. 
She is requesting a loan to puy seasonal clothes to supply the demand from her customers. This will enable her to gain more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy seasonal apparel.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is 43 years-old and married with four children who go to school.  To earn a living, she rents out houses.  She has engaged in the business for ten years.  In addition, she sells clothes to generate additional income. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been trained on financial management.  This has helped her save her money and invest in her business.

Susan has requested for a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings to renovate her rental houses.

loans.use: To renovate her rental houses

loans.name: Mbega

texts.en:
Mbega is a divorced man with two children, one girl and one boy. He lives in a rental house that has neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past four years, he has operated a matatu (motor vehicle) business. His potential customers are passengers. His major challenges are the high costs of fuel and competition from other motor vehicle operators. He dreams of establishing a business selling second hand clothes.

With the KSHS 20,000, he wants to establish a second hand clothes business and purchase bundles of clothes for resale. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: To establish a second hand clothes business and purchase bundles of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Joel Humberto

texts.es:
El Sr.Joel tiene 35 años de edad, está acompañado con la Sra. Lilian, tienen 2 hijos juntos, todos en edad escolar y viven en la cuidad de Carapeguá.
Como proviene de una familia humilde y con ganas de salir adelante decidió trabajar como ayudante de albañil, en poco tiempo logró juntar un poco de capital para empezar a comprar mercaderías y llevar a vender por la capital del país, donde ya tiene una buena clientela formada. Gracias a su trabajo y esfuerzo  pudo comprarse una motocicleta la cual  utiliza para realizar sus ventas y mantener la buena clientela. Comenta que todo lo que hace es por buscar un mejor futuro para su esposa e hijos.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de frazadas, fajas y sábanas puesto que tiene muchos pedidos de estos productos.
texts.en:
Joel is 35 years old, has a partner called Lilian, and they have 2 children who are both in school. They all live in the city of Carapeguá. He comes from a humble family but had a strong desire to get ahead in life so he decided to work as a bricklayer's assistant. In a little while, he was able to raise a small amount of capital to start buying merchandise and started selling goods in the country's capital, where he already has loyal customers. Thanks to his work and effort, he was able to buy a motorcycle, which he uses to make his sales and keep a good customer base. He comments that everything he does is aimed at securing a better future for his wife and children.
He is requesting this loan to buy blankets, sashes, and sheets as he has many requests for these products.

loans.use: to buy blankets, sashes, and sheets.

loans.name: Thandeka Winile's Group

texts.en:
Thandeka is 37 years old.  She is single and has 4 children between the ages of 4 and 17.  Three of her children attend school.  Thandeka runs a clothing business in Kwa Zulu Natal in Empangeni, South Africa. In the photo she is pictured raising her hand.

Thandeka has been in this business for a year, selling second-hand clothes.  She requested this loan through WDB and Kiva to buy second-hand clothes to resell. Thandeka says that the extra income from this loan will help her see a change in her business because she has just started. The main challenges she faces is lack of money when she needs to purchase her stock. In the future she would like to see her business grow and  end up selling new clothes and have employees.   She added that she hopes WDB and Kiva will bring change to her and her neighbourhood from the help she got from both companies.

loans.use: To buy second-hand clothes to resell

loans.name: Wesley

texts.en:
Wesley is 33 years old. He is an aggressive, hardworking and focused businessman. He is married and blessed with two children aged eight and two. He has been offering bureau services to make a living for the last five years. He wants in the next five years to have moved to a bigger premise and employed more personnel. His dream is to have a printing firm. 

He is requesting a loan of 30,000 Kenya shillings to upgrade the internet and buy printing papers and cartridges. Thanks to Faulu Kenya, he has now developed a saving culture and become wiser in transacting business.

loans.use: to upgrade his internet service and to buy printing papers and cartridges

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is 51 years old and married with two children who are 15 and 20 years old. She does poultry farming to earn a living. She has employed one person to assist her in her business. Esther has been in the business for five years and she has improved her business through Faulu Kenya. Esther hopes to open other outlets of her business in the future. She has requested 20,000 Kenyan shillings to buy chicken feed.

loans.use: To buy chicken feed

loans.name: Antony

texts.en:
Antony is 32 years old and married to Winfred. They have two children aged ten and seven years old. He has been running his bakery business for the past three years. He earns a monthly income of about KES 15,000, which he uses to run his business and care for his family.

He has been loaned KES 20,000 by KADET LTD. He intends to use the loan to purchase more stock like wheat flour, cooking oil, sugar and expand his business. With the anticipated profit, he plans to save and repay his loan. 

He plans to open a butchery trading business at Tala in the future.

loans.use: To buy more stock like wheat flour, cooking oil, and sugar for his bakery

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is a hard working 53-year-old businesswoman. She is divorced and blessed with five children who are 34, 30, 28, 24, and 21 years old. She has been making a living for the last nine years by operating a food stall. She wants, in the next five years, to have expanded her business and moved to a bigger premise.

She is requesting a loan of 35,000 Kenya shillings to buy bags of beans and maize. Thanks to Faulu Kenya, she has gained knowledge and business management skills.

loans.use: to buy bags of beans and maize

loans.name: Maida

texts.es:
La Sra. Maida tiene 53 años de edad, es Viuda. del Sr. Migdonio, tiene un solo hijo con el que vive en su casa propia en la  ciudad de Carapeguá.
El Sr. Migdonio se dedicaba a la venta ambulante durante mucho tiempo mientras su Sra. fabricaba la tradicional frazada y sobrecama, él se encargaba de venderlo hasta que un día falleció en un trágico accidente cuando realizaba su trabajo. Desde entonces la Sra. ya viuda se encargó de todos los trabajos de su marido, actualmente hace más de 6 años que se encuentra trabajando con su hijo quien también le ayuda en la actividad.
La Sra. solicita el crédito para la compra de sobrecamas, sabanas y hamaca para abastecerse y de esa forma poder cumplir con los pedidos de la clientela.
texts.en:
53 year old Maida is the widow of Mr Migdonio. She has one son who lives with her in her house in the city of Carapeguá.
Mr Migdonio worked for many years as a traveling salesman while his wife made the traditional blankets and bedspreads. He sold these goods until one day he died in a tragic accident while working. Since then, Maida has taken on all her husband's work, and she has been doing this for 6 years, helped by her son. She is requesting a loan to buy bedspreads, cloths, and hammocks to increase her supplies and meet her customer's orders.

loans.use: to buy bedspreads, cloths, and hammocks for resale.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en: Monica is a married lady with four children.  She operates a boutique to earn a living. She has been in the business for 11 years. She has grown her business with her previous loan from Faulu Kenya. Monica hopes to open other outlets of her business in the future. She has requested 20,000 Kenyan shillings to buy clothes, shoes and cosmetics.

loans.use: To buy clothes, shoes and cosmetics

loans.name: Vanessa

texts.es:
La señora Vanessa es socia del banco comunal Caminando Juntos del Distrito de Echarate, Departamento del Cusco, tiene 24 años de edad.

Lleva varios años trabajando de esta manera y Asociación Arariwa ha estado brindándole los préstamos que ha requerido en cada ciclo. Gracias a su experiencia invierte cada préstamo adecuadamente. Empezó con un poco de mercadería y ahora ya tiene buena cantidad de comestibles y bebidas alcohólicas.  

Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles comprará: 3 cajas de cerveza, paquetes de gaseosa, paquetes de agua mineral y comestibles. 

La venta de sus bebidas las realiza por cajas y para llevar a sus casas, de esa manera evita tener que atender hasta muy tarde, ya que el trabajo doméstico también demanda esfuerzo.

"Vanessa nos comenta que... La Asociación Arariwa nos brinda la ayuda necesaria para poder iniciar nuestros propios negocios y no debemos desaprovecharla".
texts.en:
Vanessa is a member of the “Caminando Juntos” (Journeying Together) Communal Bank in the Echarate district of Cusco department. She is 24 years old.

Vanessa has worked with this program for several years and Asociacion Arariwa has offered her the loans she needs in each loan cycle. Thanks to her experience, she has invested each loan adequately. Vanessa began with very little merchandise and how she already has a good quantity of groceries and alcoholic beverages.

With her new loan of 500 new sols, she will buy 3 cases of beer, packets of soft drinks, packets of mineral water, and groceries.

The drinks are in boxes to take home. In this manner, she avoids having to attend to customers until very late, since domestic chores also demand her efforts.

Vanessa comments that “The Arariwa Association offers the help we need to be able to initiate our own businesses and we should not miss the opportunity.”

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her grocery store.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en: Julius is a hardworking 32-year-old businessman. He is married and blessed with three children who are 12, 4, and 1 years old. He has been operating a retail shop for the last seven years to meet the needs of his family. He supplements his income from the earnings he makes from his barber shop. He wants, in the next five years, to have transformed his business into a wholesale one, which is also his dream. He is requesting a loan of 20,000 Kenya shillings to purchase maize flour, rice, sugar, kerosene etc. Thanks to Faulu Kenya, he has been able to form and join a helpful group with like-minded entrepreneurs and to think objectively in his business.

loans.use: to purchase maize flour, rice, sugar, kerosene etc

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is a married lady with four children. She sells clothes to earn a living for her family.  She has been engaged in this business for seven years.  She works hard in her business to provide a good education for her children. Through Faulu Kenya, she has improved her business and has learned how to save her money.  Jane hopes to open a milk bar in the future. She has requested 15,000 Kenyan shillings to buy clothes.

loans.use: To buy clothes

loans.name: Serafín Antonio

texts.es:
Serafín es un luchador incansable, pues desde muy joven se dedicó a trabajar como independiente para rebuscarse sus propios ingresos, actualmente tiene una tienda de productos de la canasta familiar en su barrio ubicado en Medellín. 

Serafín necesita de un préstamo para ampliar su oferta de productos y así poder vender mayor variedad de gaseosas, cerveza y granos en general.
texts.en:
Serafín is a tireless worker, who has worked independently from a very young age to earn his own money. He currently has a store selling basic household products in his neighborhood in Medellín.   

Serafín needs a loan to expand his offering of products, thus enabling him to sell a greater variety of soft drinks, beer and grains in general.

loans.use: to buy basic household products.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a budding 33-year-old business lady. She is married and blessed with three children who are in school. She has been operating a slaughterhouse for the last three years in order to meet the needs of her family. She wants, in the next five years, to have expanded her business and in the future open up more slaughterhouses.

She is requesting a loan of 40,000 Kenyan shillings to purchase slaughtering equipment. Thanks to Faulu Kenya, she has now become more focused on her business.

loans.use: to purchase slaughtering equipment

loans.name: María Magdalena

texts.es: María es socia del Banco Comunal Sarita, tiene 40 años y vive con cuatro de sus cinco hijos. Hace tres años su marido falleció y María tuvo que enfrentar el desafió de criar a sus hijos completamente sola. Ella solicita el préstamo para su negocio de venta de lozas.  Ella compra ollas, platos y cucharas por mayor y las vende como ambulante.  Dice que siempre trata de tener una selección surtida de sus productos.  María lleva mas de 15 años con FINCA Perú pero cuando falleció su esposo se salio por un año y luego volvió cuando pudo superar la soledad.  Aunque la ausencia de su pareja le causo mucho sufrimiento ella nunca cayó en deuda. Lo que mas le gusta a María de las reuniones de su Bancomunal son los valores de la puntualidad y la responsabilidad que le han inculcado y las amistades que ha creado con las socias. Su hijo mayor esta en Huancayo sacando su titulo para ser profesor y María esta ahorrando para pagar lo ultimo que le queda de estudio. En FINCA Perú ella ahorra para sus hijos y dice que gracias a ese apoyo nunca le hace falta comida en su hogar o para los pasajes de sus hijos. María siempre tiene presente que lo mas importante es siempre trabajar con alegría y amor, y que con esa perspectiva todo sale bien.
texts.en:
María is a member of the Sarita community bank.  She is 40 years old and lives with four of her five children.  Three years ago María's husband died and she had to face the challenge of raising her children completely on her own.  She is requesting this loan for her business selling kitchenware.  She buys pans, plates and spoons wholesale and then sells them as an itinerant vendor.  She says that she always tries to have a selection of products in stock.  

María has been working with FINCA Peru for more than 15 years.  When her husband died she took a year out and then returned when she was able to overcome her loneliness.  Although the absence of her partner caused her a lot of suffering, she never fell into debt.  What María most enjoys about her community bank meetings are the values of punctuality and responsibility that are instilled into everybody and the friendships that she has with her fellow group members.

María's eldest son is in Huancayo, finishing his degree so that he can become a teacher.  María is saving up so that she can cover the last remaining payments for his studies.  Through FINCA Peru, María saves for her children and says that, thanks to this support, she is always able to provide food for her household and cover her children's transport costs.  María always bears in mind that the most important thing is to always work with happiness and love and that, with this outlook, everything turns out well.

loans.use: to buy pans, plates and spoons wholesale

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: Maria es socia del Banco Comunal Milagros, tiene 51 años y vive con su esposo y tres de sus seis hijos. Su hija de 21 esta estudiando Psicología en la Universidad Alas Peruanas. Ella estará utilizando su préstamo para viajar a Lima a comprar losa por mayor en Jiron Puno, y venderlas por menor con su esposo en triciclo.  Les venden a hogares, restaurantes y por pedidos. Maria lleva 32 años de casada y trabajando. Aparte de su negocio de lozas ella tambien compra artesania de Quinua (retablos, piedras de Huamanga, y el nacimiento en ceramica) y las lleva a Cusco. Maria ha sido socia de FINCA Perú por un par de años pero se salió cuando su esposo se tuvo que mudar mas lejos por el trabajo. Se acaba de reiniciar como socia y apenas terminó su primer ciclo. Lo que mas le gusta de FINCA Perú son los ahorros y la atención que las promotoras le dan a las socias. María paso todo el mes de Marzo en Lima cuidando a su madre que fue operada. Ella dice que eso le afecto mucho el trabajo, pero que ahora esta trabajando muy duro para superar el tiempo que no pudo vender.
texts.en:
María is a member of the 'Milagros' community bank.  She is 51 years old and lives with her husband and three of her six children.  Her 21 year-old daughter is studying psychology at the Universidad Alas Peruanas.

María will be using this loan to travel to Lima to buy kitchenware wholesale in Jiron Puno.  She will then sell the products retail with her husband on their three-wheeled cart.  They sell their products to homes and restaurants, and also to order.  María has been married and working for 32 years.  In addition to her business selling kitchenware, she also buys handicrafts in Quinua (devotional paintings, Huamanga stone carvings and ceramic birth mementos) and takes them to Cusco to sell.

Maria has been a member of FINCA Peru for a couple of years but she left when her husband had to move away for work reasons.  She has recently rejoined as a member and has just finished her first loan cycle.  What she most likes about FINCA Peru are the savings and the attention that the loan officers give to members.  Maria spent the whole of the month of March in Lima, taking care of her mother who had an operation.  She says that this affected her work a lot but now she is working very hard to make up for the time that she was unable to make any sales.

loans.use: to buy kitchenware wholesale in Lima

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia es socia del Banco Comunal Milagros, tiene 60 años y vive con su esposo y cuatro de sus cinco hijos.  El mayor de sus cuatro hijos, tiene 18 años y esta estudiando administración de empresa en la Universidad Alas Peruanas. Ella utilizará su préstamo para su negocio de productos de belleza de Unique.  Julia le hace pedidos a el negocio y luego le vende a conocidos, amigos y a instituciones. Empezó a trabajar con la empresa hace cinco años cuando ella se unió a FINCA Perú.
Dice que lo que mas le gusta de la organizacion es que le han inculcado mucho la importancia de la puntualidad. Ella es una socia invicta, lo que significa que nunca llega tarde a las reuniones. Dice que le parece tan importante la puntualidad, que también le ha enseñado a su esposo y a sus hijos. Las charlas y capacitaciones que ofrece FINCA Perú han educado a Julia a ser una mejor madre y esposa. Eventualmente, Julia quiere poder depender de su propia capital y nunca tener que pedir un préstamo de nuevo.
Su meta es terminar de construir su casa y que todos sus hijos tengan carreras profesionales.
texts.en:
Julia is a member of the “Milagros” (Miracles) Communal Bank. She is 60 years old and lives with her husband and 4 of their 5 children. The eldest of these 4 children is 18 years old and studying business administration at the Alas Peruanas University. 

She will use her loan for her Unique beauty products business. Julia orders from Unique and then sells the products to people she knows, and to friends, and institutions. She began to work with Unique some 5 years ago when she joined FINCA Peru.

Julia says that what she likes most about FINCA Peru is that it has inculcated in her the importance of punctuality. She is an 'unconquered member,' which means that she has never been late for a meeting. She says that punctuality seems so important to her, that she has taught it to her husband and children. The talks and training offered by FINCA Peru have educated Julia to be a better mother and wife.

Eventually, Julia would like to be able to depend upon her own capital and never have to request a new loan. Her goals are to finish building her house and for all her children to have professional careers.

loans.use: to buy beauty products to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Santo Domingo Group

texts.es:
La formación del presente comité fue gracias a que una de las miembros oyó hablar del programa de mujeres emprendedoras, la idea le fue de mucho agrado y decidió organizar a sus vecinas y amigas de la ciudad de Carapeguá. Todas ellas se unieron con el propósito de obtener mayores ingresos económicos y de esa forma ayudar a sus familias. Actualmente está formado por 10 mujeres, todas ellas trabajan de forma conjunta y solidaria dentro de un ambiente de respeto.
La Señora Marta es tejedora, ella se dedica a esto hace ya mucho tiempo, pues desde pequeña aprendió esta profesión. Por medio de este trabajo ella ha podido mantenerse y mantener a su familia. Ella está muy orgullosa con el trabajo que hace, pues es un trabajo digno y honesto. Comenta que todo lo que hace es por el bien de su familia y de todos quienes dependen de ella. Se define como una mujer trabajador a y luchadora sin temor al trabajo.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de hilos, kits de agujas, telas y demás para la elaboración de los tejidos que realiza. Desde ya agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en:
The formation of this communal bank occurred thanks to one of the members, who heard people talking about a program for entrepreneurial women and liked the idea very much. She decided to organize her friends and neighbors in the city of Carapeguá.

Currently, the group consists of 10 women. All of them work together to achieve better incomes to take home, so that they can contribute to the expenses that arise day by day. 

Marta is a weaver. She has done this work for a long time, learning the profession when she was very young. Through this work, she has been able to support herself and her family. She is very proud of the work she does, since it is honest and dignified work. She comments that everything she does is for the good of her family and for all those who depend on her. 

She is requesting the loan to buy thread, needle kits, fabric and other supplies to make her weavings.

loans.use: compra de hilos, agujas, telas y demás para la confección de los tejidos.

loans.name: Yumi Giannina

texts.es:
Yumi nació en la comunidad Papel Pata en el distrito de Echarate provincia de la Convección (Cusco, Perú) y tiene 30 años de edad. Yumi trabajó en la municipalidad de Echarate en el área de Almacén de Obra pero por motivos de salud tuvo que renunciar. Ella es una mujer luchadora que no se deja vencer por las adversidades y decidió aplicar lo que sus padres le enseñaron sobre la agricultura. Ella tiene varios terrenos donde cultiva plátanos y un poco de cacao. Ella vende sus productos en la ciudad de Quillabambaa a 45 minutos de donde vive. En esta oportunidad Yumi requiere el préstamo para limpiar la mala yerba que crece en sus cultivos entonces tiene que contratar peones y después les pagará. Su sueño de Yumi es abrir una empresa de venta de frutas al por mayor. 

La socia es una persona responsable y trabajadora que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal la “Caminando Juntos” de la Asociación Arariwa sede Quillabamba.
texts.en:
Yumi was born in the commmunity of Papel Pata, in Echarate district, in La Convección province, in Cusco, Peru.  She is 30 years old.  Yumi worked for Echarate council in the field of storage.  However, she had to give up her job for health reasons.  She is a tenacious woman who doesn't let herself be beaten by setbacks.  She decided to put into practice what her parents taught her about farming.  She has several plots of land where she grows bananas and a little cacao.  She sells her produce in the city of Quillabamba which is 45 minutes from where she lives.  On this occasion, Yumi needs a loan to get rid of the weeds around her crops.  For this, she needs to hire laborers and pay them.  Yumi's dream is to open a business selling fruit wholesale.  

Yumi is a responsible and hard-working person who, owing to these personal qualities, was invited by her friends to join Asociación Arariwa's "Caminando Juntos" community bank.

loans.use: to pay workers' wages

loans.name: Severiano

texts.es:
El señor Severiano de 43 años de edad, es esposo de la señora  Mirta de 46 años de edad, ellos tienen 3 hijos.
Severiano se dedica a la venta de artículos de mercería y bazar, esta actividad lo realiza hace más de 15 años. La venta lo realiza en varias ciudades. Él recorre sin móvil, viaja en ómnibus, y recorre tiendas y librerías ofreciendo sus mercaderías como peluches, chiches para escritorio, flores, floreros y otros.
Manifiesta que su trabajo es muy sacrificado pues implica un gran esfuerzo salir a recorres y tratar d vender sus mercaderías, pero dice que todo esfuerzo es poco por brindarle a su familia lo mejor.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de regalos o presentes, pues se acerca el día de la amistad y tiene muchos pedidos para esa fecha. El agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le brinda.
texts.en:
Señor Severiano is 43 years old and is the husband of Señora Mirta who is 46.  They have 3 children.  Severiano has been selling bazaar merchandise and trinkets for more than 15 years.  He makes his sales in various cities.  He travels by bus selling merchandise such as stuffed animals, desktop toys, flowers, vases, and more to stores and book stores.  He says that his job requires a lot of sacrifices because it takes a lot of effort to travel and try to sell his merchandise.  He also says that all his effort is small because he can give his family the best. 

He is requesting a loan to buy gifts items as Friendship Day is getting close and he has many orders for this date.  He is grateful to Fundación for the opportunity that they have given him.

loans.use: purchase gift items to sell.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: Martha es socia del Banco comunal Ccatun Sacha, vive con su esposo y el ultimo D. sus 5 hijos. Su hijo menor muy pronto obtendrá su licenciatura en contabilidad. Martha va a utilizar su préstamo para invertir en su negocio D. venta D. ropa, alimentos y especias. Que lo compra D. los distribuidores y los venD. en diversas ferias. Ella ha estado en este negocio desD. hace ocho años, y con FINCA Perú por más D. diez años. Martha se retiró D. su banco por tres años, pero volvió a entrar hace dos años. Le gusta ver crecer sus ahorros. Ella está guardando para reconstruir su casa D. adobe con "material noble", como ella lo describe. Su hija también es miembro del mismo banco, y tiene más ahorro acumulado que su madre. Ella dice que esto la hace muy orgullosa.
texts.en:
Martha is a member of the 'Ccatun Sacha' community bank.  She lives with her husband and the youngest of her five children.  Her youngest son will soon receive his degree in accountancy.

Martha will use her loan to invest in her business selling clothes, food and spices which she buys from distributors and then sells in different street markets.  She has been in this business for eight years and has worked with FINCA Peru for more than ten years.  Martha left her bank for three years but then joined again two years ago.  She likes to see her savings grow.  Martha is saving up to rebuild her adobe house with "material noble" as she puts it (solid, good-quality building materials).  Her daughter is also a member of the same community bank and she has more savings than her mother.  She says that this makes her very proud.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothes

loans.name: Carmenza

texts.es:
Llegar a tener su propio almacén ubicado en un sector comercial de la ciudad de Medellín  es el sueño de Carmenza quien desde hace algún tiempo empezó a vender mercancía en su casa. Pulseras, aretes y diferentes accesorios así como artículos por catálogo forman parte de la oferta de productos que esta emprendedora le ofrece a sus familiares, vecinos, amigos y conocidos quienes se han convertido en sus clientes. 

Actualmente esta mujer emprendedora necesita de un préstamo para comprar perfumería y ropa lo que complementará su oferta de mercancía y así mejorará sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Owning her own warehouse in the commercial district of Medellín is Carmenza's dream. Some time ago she started selling goods from her home. Bracelets, earrings and various accessories, as well as catalog items, are part of the product offering that this entrepreneur sells to  family members, neighbors, friends and acquaintances who have become her clients. 

Currently, this enterprising woman needs a loan to buy perfume and clothing which will complement her range of merchandise and thus increase her income.

loans.use: to buy perfume and clothing.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: Virginia tiene 37 años y tiene cinco hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Echarate provincia de la Convención (Cusco, Perú), vive en la comunidad de Chogona a 45 minutos de la ciudad de Quillabamba. Ella se dedica al cultivo de café, cacao, achote y frutas. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para pagar los estudios de sus hijos. (Quillabamba es ciudad capital de Provincia de La Convención e importante centro de comercio de las valles de Lares y La Convención, las actividades principales son la producción de coca, café, cacao y frutales.)
texts.en:
Virginia is 37 years old and has five children.  She was born in the city of Echarate, in La Convención province (Cusco, Peru).  She currently lives in Chogona community which is located 45 minutes from the city of Quillabamba.  She grows coffee, cacao, annatto and fruit.  On this occasion, she needs a loan to pay for her children's studies.

Quillabamba is the capital of La Convención province and an important commercial center for the Lares and La Convención valleys.  The main business activities in this area are coca, coffee, cacao and fruit production.

loans.use: to pay for her children's studies

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase a plot of land to begin a farming business

loans.name: Lorenza

texts.es:
(Quillabamba es la ciudad capital D. la Provincia D. La Convención e importante centro D. comercio D. las valles D. Lares y La Convención, las actividades principales son la producción D. coca, café, cacao y frutales.)
Lorenza tiene 65 años y tiene tres hijos, ella nació en la ciudad D. Urubamba provincia D. Urubamba (Cusco, Perú) pero ahora vive en la comunidad D. Chongona a 45 minutos D. la ciudad D. Quillabamba (La Convención, Cusco). Ella se dedica al cultivo D. café, cacao, achote y frutas. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para pagar los sueldos D. los peones que le ayudaran a limpiar la mala Hierba D. sus terrenos D. cultivos.
texts.en:
Quillabamba is the capital city of the La Convención province.  It is an important commercial center for the Lares and La Convención valleys.  Its primary business activities are the production of coca, coffee, cacao, and fruits.

Lorenza is 65 years old, and she has three children.  She was born in the city of Urubamba, Urubamba province, Cusco, Perú.  However, she now lives in the Chongona community, which is 45 minutes from the city of Quillamba (La Convención, Cusco).  

She devotes herself to growing coffee, cacao, annatto, and fruits.

On this occasion she needs a loan to pay the salaries of the field workers who help her clear the weeds from her cropland.

loans.use: to pay the field workers' salaries.

loans.name: Koffi

texts.fr:
Koffi est âgé de 22ans .Il est célibataire sans enfant.

Il travaille comme revendeur depuis 2009 ; il vend des produits d’alimentation générale, des boissons locales puis de l’huile à moteur. Il s’approvisionne à Lomé puis revend à domicile dans son quartier d’Agoé Démakpoé.

Il a requis son premier à WAGES afin de mieux s’approvisionner et répondre parfaitement à la demande.
texts.en:
Koffi is 22 years old. He is single with no children.

He became a reseller in 2009. He sells general food items, local beverages, and also motor oil. He buys his merchandise in Lomé for the purpose of reselling in his neighborhood of Agoè Démakpoé.

He is seeking this first loan from WAGES to improve his supply power and offer impeccable response to customer demand

loans.use: to buy general food items for resale

loans.name: Wassilatou

texts.fr:
Wassilatou est âgée de 34 ans. Elle est mariée à un entrepreneur. Elle a deux enfants.

Elle travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2002. Elle vend des cartes de recharges puis des produits d’alimentation générale. Elle s’approvisionne au Grand marché de Lomé puis revend à domicile à Agoé.
Elle  a requis son premier crédit à WAGES afin d’acheter plus de cartes de recharges  et de produits d’alimentation.
texts.en:
Wassilatou is 34 years old. She is married to an entrepreneur. She has two children.

She has been working as a retailer since 2002. She sells prepaid cards and groceries. She gets her supplies from the Grand Market in Lome and resells at home in Agoe.

She requested her first loan from WAGES to buy more prepaid cards and groceries.

loans.use: to buy groceries and prepaid phone cards.

loans.name: Adriana María

texts.es:
Aprovechando la ubicación de su vivienda en el municipio de Concordia al suroeste de Antioquia y con el propósito de ayudarle a su esposo a cubrir los gastos del hogar para ofrecerle una mejora calidad de vida a sus dos hijos, Adriana decidió crear su propio negocio, una tienda en la que además de ofrecer algunos productos de la canasta familiar vende gaseosas snaks y dulces. 

Su sueño es ampliar su negocio hasta convertirlo en un local reconocido en el municipio para ofrecerle una buena educación a sus hijos. 

Actualmente esta emprendedora necesita de un préstamo para comprar un enfriador y algunos productos diferentes para ofrecer mayor variedad.
texts.en:
By taking advantage of her home in Concordia, in the southeast of Antioquia, Adriana decided to create her own business; a store where she sells groceries, snacks, and candy.  She wanted to help her husband pay the household expenses and offer a better quality of life to her children. 

Her dream is to convert her business into a well-known store around town, so that she can provider her children with a good education.

She currently needs a loan to buy a cooler and some different products to be able to offer a greater variety.

loans.use: to buy a cooler and merchandise.

loans.name: Raul De Jesus

texts.es:
Desde el año 2001 Raúl tiene su propia empresa donde elabora productos de aseo que son distribuidos y comercializados en vaR. barR. de la ciudad. 

Su empresa con el tiempo ha crecido gracias a la calidad del producto que fábrica, con su empresa el ha logrado sostener sus 3 hijos y les ha brindado una buena calidad de vida y estudio.

Raul quiere que su empresa crezca y así poder no solo incrementar sus ingresos sino poder comprar un carrito para realizar la distribución, sin embargo para lograrlo necesita incrementar sus insumos para así poder aumentar su producción.
texts.en:
Raúl has had his own company since 2001, where he makes cleaning products and sells them in various neighborhoods around the city.

His company has grown over time, thanks to the quality of the products he makes.  It has allowed him to support his three children and has provided a good quality of life and study.

Raúl wants to grow his company and increase his income and would like to buy a cart to make his deliveries, however to do so he needs to increase his supplies to be able to increase production.

loans.use: to buy supplies

loans.name: Mouimatou

texts.fr:
Mouimatou est âgée de 41 ans .Elle est mariée à un revendeur. Elle a deux enfants.

Elle travaille comme revendeuse  depuis 1995.Elle achète des produits de mercerie au grand marché de Lomé qu’elle revend au marché de Zongo à Agoé.

Elle a requis son deuxième crédit de WAGES  afin de s’approvisionner en produits de mercerie pour répondre aux attentes de  ses clients.
texts.en:
Mouimatou is 41 years old and is married to a retailer. She has two children. She has been working as a retailer since 1995. She makes her purchases of sewing supplies at the Grand Market of Lomé and resells them at the Zongo market in Agoé. 

Mouimatou has requested her second WAGES loan to stock up on sewing supplies in order to respond to the requirements of her customers.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies

loans.name: Abla

texts.fr:
Abla est une femme âgée de 58 ans. Elle est mariée à un secrétaire à la retraite. Elle a deux enfants.

Elle travaille comme revendeuse depuis 1986.Elle achète des pagnes au grand marché de Lomé puis les revend dans divers  marchés comme celui d’Assiyéyé, d’Avéta puis de Tsévié.

Elle a requis son premier crédit  de WAGES afin d’acheter plus de pagnes pour satisfaire les choix très variés de sa clientèle.
texts.en:
Abla is a 58-year-old woman who is married to a retired secretary. She has two children.

Abla became a reseller in 1986. She buys pagnes (colorful West-African cloth) at the Grand market of Lomé, and sells her merchandise at various markets such as those of Assiyéyé, Avéta and Tsévié. 

She is seeking her first loan from WAGES to stock up on pagnes and meet her customers’ very diverse requirements.

loans.use: to buy pagnes for resale

loans.name: Akou

texts.fr:
Akou est une femme  âgée de 40 ans. Elle est  mariée  å un retraité. Elle a un  enfant. 
Akou  travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2005. Elle  vend de la boisson locale  à toutes personnes  servis à domicile. Elle achète les produits à Tabligbo. Elle travaille  seule pour satisfaire la demande. Au moment, de sa difficulté principale est de ne pas pouvoir  servir à volonté sa clientèle qui ne cesse de s’accroître.
Akou a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des bidons de boisson.
texts.en:
Akou is a 40-year-old woman who is married to a retiree and has one child.

Akou became a reseller in 2005. She sells a local beverage from her home to a clientele consisting of all types of people. She buys her stock in Tabligbo and works alone. At present time, her main challenge is not being able to meet customer demand, which is increasing steadily.

Akou is seeking her first loan from WAGES to stock up on drums of this local beverage.

loans.use: to buy drums of the local beverage SODABI

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en: Gloria is 57 years old and has two children. She has a small juice stand in which she sells all types of juices such as orange, passion fruit, apple and other specialty blends of juices. All of the juices she sells are fresh squeezed and made to order for her customers. Gloria is asking for a loan in order to pay for the rent on her food stall where she makes and sells her juices. She then wants to put her profits towards generally improving her business. She is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to pay for the rent on her juice stall.

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.es: Gabriel tiene 44 años, convive con Marina de 45 años y tienen 05 hijos en etapa escolar. Juntos viven en su propia casa en la comunidad de triboline. Gabriel, desde muy joven empezó a criar y comercializar ganado vacuno en su pueblo de Triboline, negocio en el que viene posicionándose de manera rápida y segura en los mercados de distintos distritos. En cuanto a su economía esta prosperando vertiginosamente debido al buen servicio que otorga a sus clientes. Por lo general trabaja por cuenta propia, pero en  ocasiones recibe la ayuda de sus familiares quienes se encargan de llevar pastos a los rebaños ara alimentar a sus animales. Gabriel solicita el crédito para comprar semillas de pastos, y así mantener bien alimentados a sus reses, pues su plan es comprar más cabezas de animales, con la finalidad aumentar su capital de trabajo. Este es su sexto crédito, por la cual se siente muy contento de  saber que tendrá un apoyo de parte de ustedes, ya que así se sentirá seguro de comprar lo solicitado y está dispuesto a devolver puntualmente los pagos programados. Con el monto solicitado comprará semillas de pasto ya que cuenta con media hectárea de terreno por cultivar.
texts.en:
Gabriel, age 44, lives with 45 year old Marina.  They have five school age children.  They live together in their own house in the Triboline community.  When he was very young Gabriel started to raise and sell cattle in his town, Triboline.  The business has been positioning itself quickly and steadily in the markets of different districts.

In regards to his finances, he is prospering dramatically due to the good service he gives his customers.  He generally works on his own, but sometimes he gets help from family members who take the fodder to the herd to feed his animals.

Gabriel is requesting a loan to buy seeds for the pasture.  That way he will keep his cattle well-fed.  His plan is to buy more heads of cattle so that he can increase his work capital.  This is his sixth loan.  He is very happy knowing that he will have your support.  That way he will be certain to buy what he requested.  He is prepared to make his payments punctually.

With the requested loan he will buy seeds for his pasture because he has half of a hectare of land to cultivate.

loans.use: to buy seeds for the pasture.

loans.name: Kuña Marangatu Group

texts.es:
Este grupo es de la ciudad de Encarnación, surge por el contacto de una de las integrantes con la fundación, el grupo se encuentra en el 19º ciclo, opera con la Fundación desde el año 2006. Cuenta actualmente con 15 miembros, todas ellas trabajan de forma solidaria y en un ambiente de cooperación  
Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. María Alicia, tiene 6 hijos grandes es casada y tiene una Despensa y Mercería en su domicilio. Está en una esquina muy vistosa y concurrida de la zona. Cuenta la Señora sueña con poder ampliar su negocio, lo cual le servirá para tener mas productos en exhibición, ella por medio de su trabajo ha logrado salir adelante y brindar a sus hijos un mejor futuro.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, hortalizas y demás para abastecer su negocio y de esa forma poder cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
This group is from Encarnación and was formed after one of the members got in touch with the foundation.  The group is in its 19 loan cycle and has been operating with the foundation since 2006.  It has 15 members, all ladies who work individually, but in an air of cooperation.

María Alicia is one of the members.  She’s married and has six adult children.   María Alicia runs a grocery and general store out of her home.  It’s located in a very well-known and travelled zone.  She wants to expand her business, which will allow her to have more items on display and, through her work, allow her to get ahead and provide a better future to her children.

She is asking for this loan so in order to buy food, drinks, vegetables, and other things to stock her business and be able to meet her customers’ needs.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Arturo

texts.es:
(Quillabamba es la ciudad capital de la Provincia de La Convención e importante centro de comercio de las valles de Lares y La Convención, las actividades principales son la producción de coca, café, cacao y frutales.)
Arturo tiene 28 años de edad y tiene un hijo, él nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba provincia de La Convección  (Cusco, Perú) pero ahora vive en la ciudad de Echarate a una hora de la ciudad de Quillabamba (La Convección, Cusco). El tiene un pequeño negocio familiar que consiste en la venta de materiales de ferretería. Ya es un año que funciona el negocio y le está yendo muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales y herramientas como por ejemplo guías, pinturas, colas de carpintero y otras cosas.
texts.en:
Quillabamba is the capital city of the La Convención province.  It is an important commercial center for the Lares and La Convención valleys.  Its primary business activities are the production of coca, coffee, cacao, and fruits.

Arturo is 28 years old, and he has one child.  He was born in the city of Quillabamba, La Convección province, Cusco, Perú.  However, he now lives in the city of Echarate, which is an hour from the city of Quillamba (La Convención, Cusco).  

He has a small family business, which consists of selling hardware.  The business has been operational for one year.  It is going very well for him thanks to the effort he puts into his work.

On this occasion he needs a loan to buy materials and tools like guides, paint, carpenters’ glue, and other things.

loans.use: to buy materials and tools.

loans.name: Kayi

texts.fr: Kayi est une dame de 48ans. Pour voir grandir ses 03 enfants dans de bonnes conditions, elle a sollicité ce crédit pour  acheter des bijoux à COTONOU et au GRAND MARCHE de Lomé afin de revendre. Elle a démarré en 1995 et son conjoint est électricien auto.
texts.en: Kayi is a 48-year old woman. In order to  offer decent life conditions to her three children, she is seeking this loan for the purpose of buying jewelry in Cotonoou and at the big market of Lome for resale. She launched her business in 1995. Her husband is a car electrician.

loans.use: to buy jewelry (for resale)

loans.name: Yamileth

texts.es: Yamileth, tiene la edad de 32 años, está casada  y vive con sus 2 hijos y su esposo. Ella pretende con el crédito comprar terneros de cría. Ella  cuenta con el terreno apto para la explotación de ganado y lo que pretende es engordarlos para luego comerciarlos en el mercado local de la zona. Ella quiere las mejores ganancias con estos animales para así poder ayudar a su esposo con los gastos y tener una mejor calidad de vida cada día más. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Yamileth is 32 years old and married.  She lives with her husband and two children.

Yamileth plans to use this loan to buy calves to raise.  She has a plot of land which is suitable for raising livestock and she plans to fatten the calves and then sell them in her local market.  She would like to make good profits from these animals so that she can help her husband with their expenses and keep improving their quality of life.

This is Yamileth's first loan from FUDECOSUR.  She hasn't received previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR offered her this loan with better repayment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy calves to raise

loans.name: Wilfer

texts.es:
Desde muy joven para poder pagar sus estudios se convirtió en ayudante de construcción y es así como el ha tenido su sustento diario para el  y su familia.

El quiere poder tener mejores herramientas para facilitarle su trabajo y así poder mejorar sus ingresos y mejorarle la calidad de vida de su familia.

Su sueño es poder tener una empresa que presta servicios de construcción, además así puede darle empleo a otras personas.
texts.en:
He became a construction worker when he was very young and needed to pay for his schooling.  Now this is the way he supports himself and his family.

He would like to have better tools in order to make his job easier and increase his income and family’s quality of life.

His dream is to have his own construction company.  This will also allow him to provide jobs for others.

loans.use: to buy new tools.

loans.name: Angel Leonidas

texts.es: El sr. Ángel, es un cliente nuevo, con buena referencia crediticia, se dedica a la atención de eventos, animación de fiestas, cumpleaños, promociones, prestes y   matrimonios. El sr. Ángel, vive en la avenida zona villa armonía, Por lo que se ha podido ver, es un cliente joven emprendedor, que trabaja con su familia y con el tiempo piensa expandir mas su negocio, y trasladarlo a un lugar mas comercial para lo cual  esta poniendo empeño a sus actividades, con mucho entusiasmo en cuanto a la ampliación de su negocio por lo cual esta solicitando  crédito, para la compra de luces inteligentes y así subir la calidad de su sistema de amplificación.
texts.en:
Sr. Ángel is a new client and has good credit references. He is an event organizer for celebrations, birthdays, promotions, and weddings. He lives on Zona Avenue in Villa Armonía. It is clear that he is an enterprising young man who works with his family. As time goes on, he plans to expand his business and move to a more commercial space. For that reason he is putting a lot of enthusiastic effort into his work.

Ángel is seeking a loan to buy a laser light system and thus improve the quality of his amplifying system.

loans.use: to buy a laser light system

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: Lidia tiene 49 años, natural de la comunidad de Triboline anexo del distrito de Sivia,  vive en su propia casa al lado de sus 04 hijos a quienes les brinda todo su apoyo. Lidia se caracteriza por ser runa persona humilde y carismática, se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente a la producción y comercialización de cacao y café, donde viene laborando desde hace 20 años. Recuerda que sus primeras ventas no lo fue tan favorable, ya que había días en donde solo le alcanzaba para su canasta familiar, más no para recuperar su capital, pero continuó apostando por esta actividad; y  fruto de su empeño y perseverancia tuvo su recompensa con el pasar de los años. Hoy es una de las mejores agricultoras de su valle, debido a que produce productos de alta calidad, además obtiene buenos ingresos económicos. En tiempos de cosecha  y deshierbo de maleza trabaja sus tierras con peones quienes la ayudan a avanzar raudamente con su faena. Ella anhela en un futuro cercano adquirir más terrenos de cultivo con la necesidad de que pueda ampliar su producción y a la vez mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Este será su 12avo crédito y por lo cual necesita el apoyo de todos ustedes para llevar consigo  su propósito, además se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas puntualmente y esta agradecida por  ser socia de su banco comunal. Con el crédito solicitado comprará abono orgánico para fertilizar sus tierras.
texts.en:
49-year old Lidia who is from the community of Triboline, a part of Sivia district, lives in her own home with her four children whom she supports. She is known as a modest and charismatic person who earns her living by farming. She has grown and sold cocoa and coffee for the last twenty years. 

Lidia remembers that her first sales were not that profitable since there were times when she only harvested enough for her family and got no return on the money she had invested. However, she persevered and as the years passed, she began to make money. Today she is one of the best farmers in the valley as her products are of high quality. She gets a good income from her business. 

At harvest time and when there are lots of weeds to remove, Lidia employs workers to quickly help her with the task. Her greatest wish is to obtain more land in the near future as she needs to increase production and at the same time improve the standard of living of her family. 

This will be her twelfth loan and she needs help from many donors to fulfill her dream. She promises to repay the money punctually and is grateful to be a member of her community bank. With this loan she plans to buy organic fertilizer for her fields.

loans.use: to buy bags of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Takuru Group

texts.en: Meet the members of the Takuru group from Kenema, in eastern Sierra Leone. They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to SMT, a Kiva partner, to apply for loans of 500,000 leones each. With the help of this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve their living conditions. Hassan is the leader of this group. He is 38 years old and married to a trader. They have three children. Hassan has been a businessman for many years now. He sells clothes. With his share of this loan, he is going to buy bundles of clothes to add to his business.

loans.use: to buy bundles of clothes to add to his business.

loans.name: Creciendo Juntos Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Creciendo Juntos”, está conformado por 18 emprendedores que se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran artesanía en cuero, preparación de mermeladas caseras, preparación de comidas caseras, cortinaje y confección de ropa para casa. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Valparaíso.
Sergio quien en la foto aparece sentado en el primer puesto de derecha a izquierda, viste una boina y chaqueta color negro, además gesticula con sus manos el signo de la paz. Se dedica a la artesanía en cueros desde hace 40 años. Realiza vestuario y bolsos en cuero, específicamente chaquetas, pantalones, morrales, bananos, monederos, entre otros. Para la fabricación de sus productos habilitó una habitación en su casa como taller, ahí cuenta con una máquina de coser industrial. 
Sus productos los ofrece de manera particular y sus clientes realizan los pedidos a medida. Además su hijo le ayuda con la promoción de sus productos y le encarga trabajos. Comenta que tiene bastante material, sin embargo considera que a veces le falta tiempo para trabajar, su horario es durante todos los días de la semana, pero es relativo. Sus productos los envía a la ciudad de Santiago por encomienda. 
La temporada de verano es favorable para ofrecer y vender sus productos, debido a que concurren bastantes turistas a ésta zona. 
Con el préstamo comprará cueros de varios colores, cierres y pegamento.
Sus metas son comprar una máquina de coser que le permita realizar una puntada más definida y una mejor terminación en sus trabajos. Además expandirse en su negocio y poder enseñarle a más gente, con esto generar fuentes de trabajo. Comenta que no le conviene establecerse en un local comercial, ya que se dedica a producir y esto le demandaría más tiempo. 
Sergio vive junto a su esposa, quien realiza mermeladas caseras. Sus sueños son comprar un terreno para construir una casa, para esto espera vender su casa y contar con el capital para invertir en su proyecto. 
Sergio está muy contento y agradecido D. crédito otorgado por Fondo Esperanza. Se está integrando al grupo, por lo que recién está conociendo a los demás socios y sus negocios. 
Valparaíso está situado a 120 kilómetros al noroeste de Santiago. Es la capital regional y además sede D. poder legislativo D. país. Es el primer puerto de la nación y ofrece gran variedad de lugares hermosos y pintorescos, como por ejemplo la casa D. poeta Pablo Neruda, ganador D. Premio Nobel.
texts.en:
The Creciendo Juntos (Growing Together) Community Bank is comprised of 18 members who work in different jobs such as leather crafts, homemade jams, food preparation, making drapes, and making clothing at home. All of the members live in the town of Valparaíso. 

Sergio (seated first on the right in the photo, wearing a black hat and jacket, and making the peace sign) has made crafts out of leather for 40 years. He makes clothing and bags, specifically jackets, pants, backpacks, pouches, wallets etc. He fixed up a room in his house as a workshop and has an industrial sewing machine there.

Sergio only makes items to order and sells them privately. His son also  helps with advertising and is responsible for some jobs. He says that he has lots of material but sometimes lacks the time to do the work. He works every day of the week but it varies somewhat. Sergio sends his products to Santiago by bus where they are picked up by the customer. The summer is a good time of year for selling his products as many tourists come to the area then. 

With the loan Sergio plans to buy leather in a variety of colours, fasteners, and glue.  His goal is to buy a sewing machine that make more defined stitches and give a better finish. He also wishes to expand the business and teach more people how to do the work. This will generate more income for him. He says that it wouldn’t suit him to have a stall or store as he only wishes to make the products, not sell them, as it would take up too much time.

Sergio’s wife makes jam in their home. Their dream is to buy a piece of land where they can build a house. To do this, they would need to sell their current home and get some money to invest in the project. 

Sergio is very happy and grateful for the loan obtained through Fondo Esperanza. As a member of the group he has recently got to know the other members and learn about their businesses.

Valparaíso is located 120 km northeast of Santiago. It is the regional capital and also home to the national legislature. The city is also the main port for the country and has beautiful, picturesque countryside where, for example, the house of Nobel prize the poet Pablo Neruda’s house is located.

loans.use: to buy leather in a variety of colours, fasteners, and glue

loans.name: Honovi Amavi

texts.fr: Mère d’01 enfant, Honovi  est revendeuse de produits alimentaires (riz, sucre, huile végétale…) et des mèches. Elle a commencé cette activité en 2007 en achetant à Lomé. Ce premier crédit lui permettra d’acheter plus de marchandises afin de répondre à la demande de la clientèle. Elle vend à domicile.
texts.en: A mother of one child, Honovi is a retailer of groceries (rice, sugar, vegetable oil…) and hair extensions. She started this business in 2007 and makes her purchases in Lomé, the capital of Togo. This initial loan will enable her to buy more merchandise in order to respond to the demands of her customers. She sells out of her house.

loans.use: to buy grocery items

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en: Miriam is 27 years old and lives with her partner. She has two children who are two weeks old and five years old. Together with her partner, she has a business fixing computers. Miriam is asking for a loan to buy repair parts for computers. She also would like to begin purchasing computers to sell. Her goal is to begin expanding her business and this loan will greatly help her to do so. Miriam is a hardworking woman and is committed to making the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy repair parts for fixing computers

loans.name: Marco Miguel

texts.es: El  sr. Marco tiene como actividad la carpintería, actividad  que realiza conjuntamente con su esposa , quien también colabora con el sustento de su hogar, el mismo que esta conformado por ellos y sus cuatro hijos que aun son menores de edad, es una familia muy trabajadora y con muchas ganas de progresar, es por esta razón que solicitan un préstamo para la compra de una maquina moldurera (maquina tupy), para así de esta  manera poder trabajar mejor y lograr mejores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en: Marco is a carpenter.  He carries out his work together with his wife who also helps contribute towards supporting their household.  Their family consists of themselves and their four dependent children.  Theirs is a very hard-working family and they have a great desire to make progress.  For this reason, they are requesting a loan to buy a Tupi machine for shaping / molding wood.  This will enable them to work better and make better income for their family.

loans.use: to buy a Tupi machine (for shaping / molding wood)

loans.name: Las Pascuas Group

texts.es:
La señora Vicenta es casada, tiene 40 años D. edad, no tuvo la oportunidad D. estudiar, tiene 12 hijos 4 D. los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a realizar costuras y al comercio ya que tiene una tienda D. artículos D. consumo diario, inicia contando con un poco D. capital y hasta ahora lleva 8 años D. experiencia, cuenta con al apoyo D. su esposo quien se dedica al comercio.

DeciD. organizar un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamos que le servirá para ampliar su capital D. trabajo, y comprar más producto para la tienda, va a comprar aguas gaseosas, jugos, golosinas, comida en lata, seriales, y entre otros productos, ya que quiere ver su tienda granD. y surtida. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a las actividades: producción agrícola, al comercio y a la artesanía.
texts.en:
Vicenta is 40 years old and married.  She didn't have the opportunity to attend school.  She has 12 children, 4 of whom are in school.  She sews and also works in commerce as she has a store where she sells basic household products.  She started out with just a little capital and now has eight years experience.  She has the support of her husband who also works in commerce.

Vicenta decided to form a group so that she could request a loan that would help expand her working capital and enable her to buy more products for her store.  She will buy soda, juice, candies, canned food, cereals and other products as she would like to have a large, well-stocked store.  The other members of this group work in farming, commerce and handicrafts.

loans.use: to buy more products for her store

loans.name: Jorge De Jesús

texts.es:
Jorge es un trabajador inigualable, pues para él cumplirle a sus clientes es una de sus prioridades, por eso considera que si debe extender su horario de trabajo hasta la noche se esmera por hacerlo de la mejor manera posible. 

Desde hace algunos años y gracias a la experiencia adquirida en trabajos anteriores, Jorge creó su  propio negocio, un taller de confecciones en el que trabaja también su esposa y dos empleadas más. 

Una de sus mayores dificultades es la falta de maquinaria, por ello, en algunas oportunidades no puede comprometerse con algunos trabajos debido a que no tiene la capacidad de respuesta para atender sus pedidos, por ello, este emprendedor necesita de un préstamo para comprar maquinaria y así crecer poco a poco y mejorar sus ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jorge is a hardworking man with no equal.  To him, pleasing his customers is one of his top priorities so he believes that he should extend his hours into the evening and he is making an effort to do it in the best possible way.

Jorge created his own business a few years ago, thanks to the experience he got from previous jobs.  He, his wife, and two other employees work in his sewing business.

One of their greatest challenges is the lack of machines and there are times when he can’t commit to some of the jobs because he does not have the capacity to fill the orders.  For this reason this entrepreneur needs this loan to be able to buy machines and increase his income little by little.  This will help him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Florindo

texts.es: Florindo, tiene la edad de 65 años, está casada, vive con su hijo, su esposa y un hermano. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de una vaca de leche. El quiere con esta compra generar la leche para el autoconsumo del hogar. El quiere con esto tener menos egresos y así poder generar más bienestar para su familia. El con la leche que no se consuma le venderá para así generar dinero para su familia. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Florindo is 65, married, and lives with his son, wife and brother.  He seeks this credit to buy a milking cow, to provide for the needs of his household.  Any excess production will be sold, in order to provide modest income for his family.  This is his first credit with FUDECOSUR, and he is pleased that this lender has given him favorable terms and a much lower interest rate than commercial or state banks.

loans.use: to buy a milking cow

loans.name: Carlos Arturo

texts.es:
Desde hace muchos años Carlos trabaja la tierra, siempre fue en compañía de un amigo, pero el decide alquilar un pedazo de tierra para cultivar tomate de aliño.

Con su cultivo a sostenido su familia conformada por su esposa y sus 3 hijos, su esposa le ayuda en el trabajo y así los dos pueden pagarle a sus hijos el estudio.

Carlos quiere mantener muy bien su producción y para esto necesita suficientes insumos para cuidarlos y poder vender los tomates a buen precio, además así se incrementan sus ingresos y le puede brindar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos has been working the land for many years, usually with a friend, but he decided to lease a piece of land on which to raise tomatoes.

He has supported his family (wife and three children) through his crops.  His wife helps him with his work and together they are able to pay for their children’s education.

Carlos wants to maintain good production, so he needs enough supplies to care for and be able to sell his tomatoes at good prices.  This will also help increase his income so that he can offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es: Lucila tiene 54 años de edad, está divorciada y tiene tres hijos en etapa escolar. Viven en la comunidad de Triboline, anexo de la ciudad de Sivia, donde tienen su propia casa construida a base de material rustico. Lucila, se dedica a la actividad agrícola, específicamente a la producción y comercialización de frutas como: piñas, mangos, pacay, plátanos y frutas cítricas, actividad que lo viene realizando desde hace 20 años. Recuerda cuando tuvo su primera parcela, empezó a construir su propio sueño, ya que tenía mucha fe, desde luego que lo consiguió. Ni bien salieron sus primeros productos, ella los vendía en el mercado de su poblado, pero de vez en cuando acudía a la feria de distintas localidades, así se hizo conocida por sus clientes. Ahora todo lo que produce los lleva a la ciudad de Ayacucho, para que los pueda vender al por mayor, de esa manera logro percibir buenos ingresos económicos lo cual le sirve para sustentar los gastos de educación de sus hijos. Por lo general trabaja por cuenta propia, pero  en tiempo de cosecha necesita el apoyo de los peones quienes se encargan de la recolección de los frutos. Con el apoyo del crédito podrá comprar fertilizantes para mejorar la calidad de sus tierras y posteriormente cosechar frutos de calidad. Su plan a futuro es construir su casa a base de material noble, con la necesidad de brindarle seguridad y comodidad a su familia. Este será su 13avo crédito, por la cual se siente muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo de parte de ustedes, ya que así se sentirá segura de comprar lo solicitado y esta dispuesta a devolver puntualmente los pagos programados. Con los 1,700 nuevos soles comprará fertilizantes naturales para mejorar la tierra de su parcela.
texts.en: Lucila is 54 years old. She is divorced and has three school-aged children. They live in the community of Triboline, an outlying part of the city of Sivia, where they have their own house built from simple materials. Lucila works in agriculture, specifically as a producer and seller of fruits such as pineapples, mangos, pacay ["ice-cream beans"], bananas and citrus fruits. She has been doing this work for 20 years. She recalls that when she had her first plot of land, she began to work toward her personal dream, since she had great faith, and because of this she succeeded. As soon as her first crops were ready, she sold them at the marketplace in her town, but she also sometimes went to the markets of other towns, and thus she became known among her customers. Now, she takes everything she produces to the city of Ayacucho, so that she can sell it wholesale. In this way, she is able to earn a good income, allowing her to pay the costs for educating her children. In general, she works independently, but at harvest time she needs help from laborers who take on the work of collecting the fruits. With the help of the loan, she will be able to buy fertilizers to improve the quality of her fields and later harvest high-quality fruits. Her plan for the future is to rebuild her house using solid materials, because she needs to provide security and comfort for her family. This will be her 13th loan, and she is very happy to know that she will have support from all of you. In this way, she feels secure in buying what she requested, and she is ready to make her scheduled payments on time. With the 1,700 Peruvian new soles, she will buy natural fertilizers to improve the soil on her piece of land.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Kpelegueba

texts.fr: Revendeuse ambulante de pagnes et des bassines à AGOE, Kpelegueba achète depuis 1999 à Lomé. Pour aider son mari électricien dans les charges du foyer, assurer un avenir radieux à ses 02 enfants et avoir plus tard sa propre boutique, elle sollicite ce prêt pour acheter plus de marchandises (pagnes et bassines).
texts.en: Selling pagnes (colorful West African cloth) and basins door-to-door in AGOE, Kpelegueba has been making her purchases in Lomé since 1999. To help her husband, an electrician, with household expenses and to ensure a brilliant future for her two children, as well as to have her own shop in the future, she is requesting this loan to buy more merchandise (pagne cloth and basins).

loans.use: to buy cloth and basins

loans.name: Development Group

texts.en:
Pictured here are members of the “Development” group from Kenema, a city in eastern Sierra Leone. They are businesspeople who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva, in order to seek a loan of SLL 500,000 for each in the group. With this loan, they will be able to add more goods to their businesses, attract more customers, make more sales and profit, and consequently improve their living conditions. 

The leader of this group of entrepreneurs is Mohamed. Mohamed is 42 years old and was born in the village of Yele, in northern Sierra Leone. He is married and has one child. His wife is a businesswoman and his child is attending primary school. Mohamed has been selling used clothes for 15 years now. With his share of this loan, he is going to buy a bundle of used clothes to add to his used clothing business.

loans.use: to buy a bundle of used clothes to add to his used clothing business

loans.name: Sodoédé

texts.fr:
Sodoédé est une femme âgé(e) de 44 ans. Elle est mariée å un menuisier. Elle a 03 enfants 
Sodoédé travaille comme revendeuse de pagnes et d’oignons  depuis 1994. Elle vend à toutes personnes à domicile, dans les marchés  et de façon ambulante. Elle achète les produits au Grand Marché de Lomé. 
Sodoédé a requis son troisième cycle de crédit à WAGES afin d’acheter des pagnes, et des oignons.
texts.en:
Sodoédé is a 44-year old woman. She is married to a carpenter. She has three children. Since 1994, Sodoédé has been selling “pagnes” [traditional colorful fabric] as well as onions. She sells to all sorts of people, out of her home, at the market and as a street vendor. She stocks up at the Big Market of Lomé. 

Sodoédé is requesting her third-cycle loan  from WAGES in order to buy sets of “pagnes” fabric and onions.

loans.use: to buy traditional "pagnes" fabric and onions

loans.name: Damaris

texts.es: Damaris, tiene la edad de 38 años, está casada, vive con sus hijos y su esposo. Ella pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal. Ella cuanta con el terreno apto sembrado de café en buenas condiciones. Ella lo que pretende realizar es aplicarle una buena abonada para así obtener mayores cosechas este año. Ella quiere generar los ingresos necesarios para así salir adelante y tener un mejor bienestar familiar. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Damaris is 38 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children.  She plans to use her loan to buy supplies for her coffee plantation.  She has a plot of land which is suitable for growing coffee in good conditions.  What she plans to do is apply a good quantity of fertilizer so that she will obtain better harvests this year.  She would like to make the income she needs to get ahead in life and improve her family's well-being.

This is Damaris' first loan from FUDECOSUR.  She has not received previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR gave her this loan with better repayment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy supplies for growing coffee

loans.name: Florencia

texts.es:
(Quillabamba es la ciudad capital de la Provincia de La Convención e importante centro de comercio de las valles de Lares y La Convención, las actividades principales son la producción de coca, café, cacao y frutales.)
Florencia tiene 53 años de edad y tiene dos hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Cusco (Perú) pero ahora vive en la comunidad de Papel Pata a 45 minutos de la ciudad de Quillabamba (La Convección, Cusco). Desde muy joven se dedico a la agricultura, ella cultiva frutas, cacao, café y los distribuye en la ciudad de Quillabamba. Ya son varios años que funciona el negocio y le está yendo muy bien gracias al empeño que pone  en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar frutas y para plantaciones de cacao.
texts.en:
Quillabamba is the capital city of La Convención province and an important commerce center in the Lares and La Convención valleys.  The main economic activity is production of coca, coffee, cacao, and fruit.

Florencia is 53-years-old and has two children.  She was born in Cusco (Peru), but no now lives in the community called Papel Pata 45 minutes away from the city of Quillabamba (La Convención, Cusco).

Since she was very young she has worked in agriculture.  She grows fruit, cacao, and coffee and distributes them in the city of Quillabamba.  She has been in this business for several years and it has been going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  At this time she needs the loan to buy fruit and for cacao plantations.

loans.use: to buy fruit and for cacao plantations.

loans.name: Guillermina

texts.es:
La Sra. Guillermina está casada con el señor Jacinto, tiene cinco hijos, uno en edad escolar.
Ella se dedica a la venta de mandioca de forma ambulante y en su domicilio, ubicado en Ciudad del Este la venta  de la misma esta cada vez más en ascenso, generándole un buen ingreso.
Con la ayuda de su esposo e hijos están  saliendo adelante con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo. Hoy día ella  es una microempresario exitosa con una clientela fiel y numerosa, debido a su amabilidad. Comenta que su trabajo es muy sacrificado ya que requiere de mucho esfuerzo. Dice que todo lo que hace es por brindarle a sus hijos un futuro mejor, sin las carencias que ella tuvo que pasar.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de mandioca, lo cual la ayudara mucho para afrontar la demanda de sus clientes. Ella está agradecida a la Fundación por la oportunidad que le da.
texts.en:
Guillermina is married to Jacinto and has five children, one of school age.  She sells cassava on foot and from her home, located in East City.  As her sales increase, it generates more income for her.  With her husband’s and children’s help, and much effort and sacrifice, they’re all getting ahead in life.  Her’s is now a successful small company and because of her mobility, it has many regular and loyal customers.  She says that her work requires lots of effort and she does it all so that she can provide a better future for her children and so that they don’t have to face the same challenges that she did.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy cassava, which will help her meet her customer’s demands.  She is grateful to the foundation for the opportunity it provides her.

loans.use: to buy cassava for resale

loans.name: Asociacion Emprendedoras Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento ASOCIACION EMPRENDEDORAS es un banco que ya trabajo nuestra institución esta en su tercer ciclo y el Banco está conformado por 8 Integrantes 7 Mujeres y 1 Varón y las señoras se dedican al comercio de diferentes  negocios, ropas y otros, la Sr. YOVANA es la secretaria en el Banco y tiene dos hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, su esposo se dedica al diseño grafico, ella se dedica a la venta de muebles y artefactos eléctricos, a facilitad, esto se refiere al crédito o contado y con el préstamo comprará más mercaderías para su negocio de esta forma mejorara sus ingresos económicos y aumento de su capital de trabajo, entrega variedad de mercaderías lo que le piden sus clientes, es una persona muy dinámica y trabajadora agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
The 'Asociación Emprendedoras' community bank is on its third loan cycle with our institution.  It has eight members: seven women and one man.  The ladies work in different sales businesses, selling clothes and other products.  

Yovana is the bank's secretary.  She has two school-age children and her husband is a graphic designer.  Yovana sells furniture and electrical appliances.  She sells on credit and for cash.  She will use this loan to buy more merchandise for her business so that she can improve her income and increase her working capital.  She will be able to deliver a variety of merchandise that her customers are requesting.  Yovana is a very dynamic and hard-working person who is grateful to the institution for the support they have given her.

loans.use: to buy merchandise wholesale

loans.name: Gloria Ines

texts.es:
Desde los 14 años Gloria aprendió de su madre el arte de confeccionar y cuando creció compra dos maquinas para empezar a trabajar como maquiladora.

Ella con su trabajo ha podido darle estudio y darles una buena vida a sus 7 hijos y a ella como tal, ya que ha podido también estudiar.

Gloria quiere comprar una maquina plana que le permita generar un empleo además de poder incrementar su producción y poderle entregar a los clientes cumplidamente.
texts.en:
Gloria learned to sew from her mother when she was 14.  When she grew up she bought two machines to begin working as a manufacturer.

Through her work she’s been able to give herself and her children a good life and pay for their education.  She has also been able to go to school.

Gloria wants to buy a sewing machine that will help her win work, be able to increase her production, and be able to deliver to her customers on time.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.en: Roxana is 21 years old and lives with her partner. She has a one-year-old daughter. Her occupation is cleaning houses. She works everyday cleaning houses in the city of Cusco. Roxana is asking for a loan in order to invest in her partner's shoe repair store. She plans to purchase machine parts for the various machines her partner uses in his store. She is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy machine parts for her partner's shoe repair store

loans.name: Julio Alberto
